location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 27/11 ‘Passports. Endorsement of British Passports for “Arabia.”

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 12; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file mostly consists of correspondence (between the India Office and the Foreign Office, between the India Office and the Colonial Office, and an internal India Office note), regarding a Foreign Office circular which it was proposed to issue to HM Consular and Passport Control Officers regarding the endorsement of British passports for ‘Arabia’ (the Arabian Peninsula).The file includes a divider, which gives a list of correspondence references contained in the file by year. This is placed at the back of the correspondence.
